name: Bambis Phone Smash Bash (FANMADE)
description:
A fun game about two characters from friday night funkin mods battling to see who can break the most phones!

Bob- FNF Vs Bob by wildy

Bambi- FNF Vs Dave And Bambi by moldyGH

A spinoff of the game with a funny secret:https://itchyron.itch.io/phonesmashbash2
